title: Gekiganger 3: The Movie
alternative_title: ゲキ・ガンガー３　熱血大決戦
description: Ken, Joe, and Akira, three high school students, must combine their three mecha into Gekiganger III to defeat the evil Prince Akara and Emperor Hyperion. The OAV is a compilation of the scenes from Nadesico, a new "movie", and is a parody of many mecha series from the 80s.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Parody>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
